strings: *: Welcome to the casino token vending area.
*: I'm afraid you're already carrying the maximum permissible number of tokens, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>.
*: Have a pleasant day!

*: You currently have <val_0> tokens, <character_0>.
How may I be of service?

*: Each casino token costs twenty gold coins.
How many would you like to purchase?

*: You'd like to leave?
Very well. Have a pleasant day.
*: I'm afraid you don't seem to have enough money.
*: I'm afraid that you can only carry <val_0> more tokens, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>.<page>

*: <val_0> tokens?<page>That will be <val_1> gold coins.
Is that okay?
*: Thank you, and have a lucky day!
*: Welcome to the exchange counter, where you can trade your casino tokens for all sorts of prizes.

*: You currently have<endash> What's this!?
I'm afraid you don't have any casino tokens at all!
*: Please come again when you've acquired some casino tokens!
*: You currently have <val_0> tokens, <IF_MALE>sir<ELSE_NOT_MALE>miss<ENDIF_MALE>. Would you like to trade some for a prize item?
*: Which prize item would you like?
*: We'll hold on to your remaining tokens for you. Please come again!
*: I'm afraid you don't have enough tokens to trade for <IF_SING val_1><INDEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0><ELSE_NOT_SING><val_1> <PLR_I_NAME_0><ENDIF_SING>.

*: <Cap><DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>?
That will be <val_0> tokens. Is that okay?

*: <IF_SING val_1>One <SGL_I_NAME_0><ELSE_NOT_SING><val_1> <PLR_I_NAME_0><ENDIF_SING>?
That will be <val_0> tokens altogether. Is that okay?
*: You might want to try using one of them as an item during battle!
*: Who would you like me to give it to?
*: Very well. I'll put it in your bag.
*: I'm afraid you can't carry any more items, <character_0>. Would you like me to organise your inventory?
*: I'm very sorry, but all of your items are important, <character_0>.
*: Can someone else take it perhaps?
*: Okay! I've organised your items, <character_0>.
*: Would you like to equip the item right away?

*: It appears that your <SGL_I_NAME_0> can't be removed!
It's cursed!

*: I'm afraid I can't do anything about it.
Shall I just hand you your prize instead?
<Cap><character_0> is equipped with <DEF_ART_SGL_I_NAME_0>.

*: You can't equip this particular item, <character_0>.
Do you still want it?
*: Are there any other prize items you're interested in?
*: Here you are, <character_0>.
*: I'll just place it in <character_0>'s coffin, then.
*: I'll put the remaining items in the bag, then.
*: Are there any other prize items you're interested in?
*: It suits you perfectly, <character_0>!
*: Thank you very much. We look forward to serving you again.

You don't have enough tokens.
Please come back after you purchase some!

It's a one-token slot machine.
Would you like to play?

It's a ten-token slot machine.
Would you like to play?

It's a hundred-token slot machine.
Would you like to play?

Insert tokens using the +Control Pad.
Press the A button to start,
and the B button to quit.
Better luck next time!

Congratulations!
You won <val_0> tokens!

You already have the maximum number of tokens!
Do you want to play anyway?

It's a bingo game.
Would you like to play?

You already have the maximum number of tokens!
Do you want to play anyway?

It's a roulette wheel.
Would you like to play?

Move the cursor with the +Control Pad,
add and remove tokens with the A and Y buttons,
and press START to spin the wheel.

You already have the maximum number of tokens!
Do you want to play anyway?
